entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces()` is returning `Unknown` for the propery `NetworkInterfaceType` on Android #99979
  • Failure building runtime from tag v8.0.3 - missing version of Microsoft.Native.Quic.MsQuic.Schannel #99978
  • [macOS] Hosting CoreCLR inside an LLDB plugin fails to initialize the runtime #99977
  • [Analyzer] Passing interpolated string to StringBuilder ctor #99975
  • JsonNode.ToJsonString can throw when JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolver is null #99971
  • [mono] Lack of generic parameter constraint checks for override methods #99967
    9.0.0
  • StackOverflowException on System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests #99963
  • [ci] Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #99961
  • [HttpStress] malloc crashes in HTTP/3 runs #99960
    9.0.0
  • [HttpStress] `H3_REQUEST_INCOMPLETE` on Linux #99959
    9.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement SVE APIs #99957
  • Run on .NET 8 Arm64 seems to remove some parts of a conditional statement, probably only after Tier 1 JIT compilation #99954
  • No TypeDefinitionDocuments entries compiled for enums/interfaces etc in pdb #99969
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.WaitAssertsOnSyncCallback #99951
    9.0.0
  • [mono] [infra] Mono/Mobile infrastructure improvements. #99949
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 8 Regressions on 3/11/2024 8:28:14 PM #99966
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 3/16/2024 1:13:28 AM #99965
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 3/15/2024 7:33:56 PM #99964
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 3/13/2024 1:55:40 AM #99968
    9.0.0
  • [mono] [infra] Unify reporting of mobile CI testing into a single console log file #99947
    9.0.0
  • ITypeLib2 COM type definition is wrong (since forever) #99946
  • C# value discard leads to range check for happy path #99943
  • Build linux-x64 Debug Mono_MiniJIT_LibrariesTests failure #99942
  • Mono interpreter leg timing out in CI on a variety of tests #99940

Closed

  • [Analyzer] BitConverter.ToString(bytes).Replace("-", "") to Convert.ToHexString #81796
    Future
  • [wasm] CreateGoodBreakpointAndHit failure #99686
    9.0.0
  • Blocking scheme changes between 302 redirects #98497
  • Unhandled NullReferenceException in System.Net.Sockets.SocketPal.GetIPPacketInformation() causing process termination #94346
    9.0.0
  • AOT optimization #99580
  • Remove `--fuse-ld=` from Native AOT link argument #99912
    9.0.0
  • Missing Enum constraint on JsonNumberEnumConverter<TEnum> in reference assembly #99878
    8.0.x
  • [Question] Case sensitivity for GetFullPath(string, string) with drive relative paths #97615
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24160.1] The ServicePointManager does not support proxies with the https scheme will pop up when using PeachPied.WordPress.AspNetCore package. #99737
    9.0.0
  • SslStress: SocketException (995) WSA_OPERATION_ABORTED on Windows #76044
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic is leaking UnobservedTaskExceptions #80111
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient setting up https connection takes 3x times longer in net8 than net7 when using container #98829
  • STJ source generator fails when defining the serializer context in 2 partial classes #99669
  • System.Text.Json.JsonException: Reference '{#}' was not found. #99881
  • Static getter Encoding.BigEndianUTF32 is private #99903
  • [mt][browser] `HttpClient_CancelInDifferentThread` failing with operation cancelled #98101
    9.0.0
  • Issues with authorization on Blazor wasm #99930
  • Using SocketsHttpHandler on macOS (net8.0-macos) with network credentials will crash the app #99891
  • `INumber.Min(+QNaN, 1)` returns 1 #98285

PullRequests

Created

  • Use msquic package in stress tests #99987
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Obsolete invalid AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalRoundedNarrowingSaturate* overloads #99985
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Move SVE-specific emitIns logic to emitarm64sve.cpp #99983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Defer parsing of wasm stack symbolication maps #99974
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Remove duplicative sorting when enumerating OrderBy.Take/Skip #99973
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT: Delete some unused fields in `CallArgABIInformation` #99972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change the CryptoKit interop entrypoints to use the Swift calling convention #99970
    area-System.Security
  • Fix detection of exceptionally called funclet in stack walk #99958
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Revert to full `NativeName` by interop with JS #99956
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [NOREVIEW] Fix HttpStress and SslStress build for Windows #99955
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Fix failing CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback test (#99915) #99950
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Fix a mistake in genInstrWithConstant #99948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • Fix x86 hardware intrinsics #99894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99981
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.18
  • Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99980
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.29
  • Be more resilient against invalid metadata in fields #99944
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Path.GetFullPath(string, string) uses case insensitive volume name comparison for drive rooted, relative paths #97759
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99976
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.4
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/6.0-staging` #99837
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Add PerfViper queues and update PerfSurf queues #99068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update design doc for Roslyn Attribute for ByRefLike generics #99916
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add generic parameter checks for fields of generic types #99911
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix reference source for JsonNumberEnumConverter<T> #99952
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Double default initial heap size #99927
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Bump main preview version to 4 #99941
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough check in optFindLoopCompactionInsertionPoint #99827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Port x86 ResumeSP logic from CoreCLR #99866
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] make blazor's sendByteArray also fire and forget #99904
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove scheme check for Proxy on ServicePointManager #99893
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Fix "[wasm] Fix "we can't find snapshot urls"" #99945
    bug, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix failing CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback test #99915
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Fix null check in RhpLockCmpXchg64 #99934
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • some code clean up in heap_select #99855
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use MemoryMarshal.Cast in a few places #99835
    area-Meta
  • Vector64: Avoid GSCookies in Vector64 software fallback #98293
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Fix some generic math DIMs to have the correct behavior #98510
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99779
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99776
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security

Updated

  • Remove invalid Unsafe.As from array helpers #99778
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial spec for the meaning and relationships between data contracts #99936
    area-Meta
  • Adding `Avx10v1` to the runtime #99784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx10
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Setting `block->bbCodeOffsEnd` to BAD_IL_OFFSET when expanding static init for calls #99662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #99909
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #99586
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99781
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Analyze recursive interfaces in illink #99566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99473
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.30
  • [release/7.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99474
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.19
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99475
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.5
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99585
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add additional checks to optimization of constant static field loads #99845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] use regular POSIX portable threadpool #99836
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios, 8.0.x
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono] Optimize mono_metadata_decode_row_col_raw #99939
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix Http2 deadlock #99889
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Delete src/installer/tests/scripts/linux-test #99848
    area-Host
  • [RISC-V] Fix struct info value in crossgen2 #99602
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Remove hasLikelihood checks; make FlowEdge::m_likelihoodSet debug-only #99925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #99695
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Support for WASI threads #98120
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improvements to startup performance of mono_wasm_get_assembly_exports #99924
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser][ws] Do not duplicate code executed in `local_on_close` #99685
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 122.0.6261.128, windows: 122.0.6261.129 #99873
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Update runtime docs. #99699
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • NativeAOT/win-x86: Enable FEATURE_EH_CALLFINALLY_THUNKS #99718
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Review UnsafeRawPointer projections in C# for CryptoKit dev templates #2529

PullRequests

Updated

  • Swift bindings generator with simple parser and emitter #2525
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Bug]: Error when using MSBuild.exe to publish a .NET 6.0 C# project for Windows and Linux x64 with /p:NoBuild=true #36693
  • "Unable to locate repository with working directory that contains directory <dir>" even without SourceLink in .Net 8.0 #36926
  • dotnet watch does not work in eng\dogfood.cmd environment #26668

Updated

  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • dotnet -ef on MacOS intelx64 throws error #37348
  • dotnet tool run <TOOL_NAME> doesn't work on Linux #33030
    9.0.1xx
  • Add `--source` for `dotnet tool install` - for specifying the package source url #37716
    9.0.1xx
  • Misleading build error with no traces in binlog when MAUI workloads are not installed #38501
    9.0.1xx
  • dotnet publish - way to remove pdb and other files #16975
  • Dependent .deps.json file not published when a package with PrivateAssets=all is included #29974
  • A fatal error was encountered. The library 'libhostpolicy.so' required to execute the application was not found in '/app/'. #3935
  • Unable to add two projects with the same name to a .sln file if the projects share the same grandparent folder #34019
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64] Install .net9preview3 X64 SDK create project on Arm64 OS, the system will be blocking. #39513
  • Publish AOT increases the assembly file size! #39012

PullRequests

Created

  • Rewrite dotnet watch command line parsing #39618
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2408559 #39615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use noble Ubuntu images by deffault starting in 8.0.300, #39614
    untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Use built-in SourceRevisionId instead of git rev-parse HEAD #39613
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • No drive enumerations Fixes #38050 #38436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to dependency flow #39602
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enhance base image inference for trimmed applications - use -extras when globalization is in use #39317
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [Static Web Assets] Fingerprint and Hash for SWA. #39405
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • dotnet watch refactoring #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Create a new label with TFM of the app and the SDK used to build the image #39196
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39531
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
  • Switching ReadOnlySpan<char> with constant strings #1881
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Overload Resolution Priority #7706

PullRequests

Updated

  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #8012
  • Add proposal for state machine restriction updates #7994

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dynamic variables fail to interpolate when using a custom InterpolatedStringHandler #72606
  • Editorconfig settings aren't being applied to code. #72594
  • There's no option to disable the vertical guides for C# 11 raw string literals #72593
  • SourceGenerators: MSBuild property (and metadata?) values are (potentially) truncated before being passed to Generator #72592

Closed

  • Watch windows shows some values as null, even if they have a value. #72595
  • Add an extension method to flatten the result of the combination of several IncrementalValueProviders #72578
  • Improve string concatenation with non-const chars to use spans #66827
    Backlog
  • Syntax classification taking up to 12% of CPU time #68996
    17.8 P4
  • Exception rethrows in .net 8.0.2 rethrow wrong exception in nested catch blocks with an await in outer catch block #72177

PullRequests

Created

  • Drop win32-ia32 language server support #72605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove workaround for .net7 r2r assembly loading issue #72603
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Share compilation when generators don't produce any generated files #72602
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preview of # 72573 #72601
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Be resilient to asset-cache mutating while retrieving assets from the host #72599
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prefer pattern-based over interface-based disposal in await using #72598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: reduce allocations in SolutionCompilationState.CreateCompilationTrackerMap #72596
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable diagnostics when solution crawler option is disabled #72590
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow modifiers in local_using_declaration #72589
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Update __arglist.md #72523
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix potential exception in AssetProvider.SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72597
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Make event-hookup-completion async, and hook up to the background work indicator #72584
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement SegmentedCollectionsMarshal #72395
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractTypeMap #72588
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [17.10] Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72458
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix excessive compilation times due to speculative parsing after an incomplete string #72565
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix #69628 Analyzer summary should show suppressor ID #72569
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Qualify the type when negating a pattern to a not pattern #72466
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Onboard VB intellisense page to Unified Settings #72471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not put an equals and quotes when completing an xml attribute if present #72508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Small allocation optimization in StateTable.Builder.ToImmutable #72364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations under RemoteAssetProvider.SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Pass the temp path to DesktopStrongNameProvider ctor #72587
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert official pipeline to 1ES template #72430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for PrimaryConstructorBaseType to SpeculativeAnalyser #72421
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not return nonexistent kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge the finally block during data flow analysis #72361
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle InterceptsLocation with location specifier string #72553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TrimmingTests failing on aspnetcore-quarantined-pr pipeline #54629
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext #54625
  • Perf improvement: mvc #54624
  • Error "InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains more than one matching element" in Swagger when using minimal api with the header versioning #54623
  • Containerizing .NET 8 Blazor WASM breaks after update from .NET 6 #54618
  • .NET 8 Blazor - DbContextFactory and EF Core Lazy Loading #54616
  • Dash in project name breakes loading css file #54615
  • MissingMethodException IsComponentDisposed() after update to .NET 7.0.17 #54614
  • Issues with authorization on Blazor WASM #54611
  • Are Indexes working for .net 8? #54610

Closed

  • 8.0 BlazorWebAppOidc IDX21323: RequireNonce is 'False' #53585
    9.0-preview3
  • Flaky test BlazorWebTemplate_IndividualAuth_LocalDb #52736
    9.0-preview4
  • dotnet watch run should allow properties forwarded to msbuild #26662
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: json #54604
  • Blazor Identity templates and CRUD scaffolding should use the DbContextFactory #54539

PullRequests

Created

  • *NO MERGE* Run quarantined tests with binlog #54632
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Fix Java discovery in helix-matrix pipeline #54631
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] Convert to 1es pipelines #54628
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • Limit parallelism of forced key ring refreshes #54627
    area-dataprotection
  • Increase logs and delays in CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54608
    area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Pass -publish parameters #54620
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Un-retry BlazorWebTemplate_IndividualAuth_LocalDb #54450
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview3
  • Revert "Use the VMR commit hash in .version (#54461)" #54619
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview3
  • Update helix OS versions #54609
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • Quarantine FormWithParentBindingContextTest.CanBindToFormWithFiles #54448
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during JS interop #54225
    area-blazor
  • Make the key ring cache expire shortly after an immediately-activated key is generated #54517
    area-dataprotection
  • Reuse known keys in XmlKeyManager #54490
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • libsosplugin.dylib: CoreCLR host crash on macOS Sonoma 14.4 on arm64 #4551

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • running dotnet publish errors #21319
  • [iOS] If you disable the flyout and then programmatically open it, the gestures and tap to close features don't work #21317
  • `Image` displays JPG photos taken in Portrait orientation in Landscape orientation (regression in 8.0.10) #21314
    .NET 8 SR4
  • .NET MAUI 8 Entry -> ClearButtonVisibility="WhileEditing" This makes the entire page crash when deployed to actual ios device -> (iOS Iphone 6 Plus version 12.5.7) #21313
    Backlog
  • Incomplete Element Tree in UI Inspector (Accessibility Insights) for .NET MAUI #21310
  • [macOS] IWindowOverlayElement.Draw dirtyRect only returns initial Window Size. #21307
    Backlog
  • [macOS] Crash in multi-window mode in the Controls.sample project #21306
    Backlog
  • Random app crashes - SIGABRT in SGen Worker #21303
  • Seemingly over-aggressive dependency caching when building iOS app #21302
  • Gap appears when Keyboard is presented and HasNavigationBar set to false (iOS) #21297
    Backlog
  • Line Break Mode issue in windows platform #21294
    Backlog
  • InvalidOperationException when using same callback scheme for WebAuthenticatorCallbackActivity and MainActivity #21293
    Backlog
  • Polylines make application unresponsive. #21292

Closed

  • Can't run the application on physical iOS device #19553
  • Problem (re)applying DataTemplates generated with a DataTemplateSelector, to collection items that are added to a CollectionView after the Collection is Cleared #21252
  • Scroll not working when placing custom layout in a Scroll view. #21269
  • MAUI new solution config failing to launch android build #21300
  • ICanvas.FillRectangle is converting values to Single and fails #21222
    Backlog
  • Adding datepicker crashes app iOS 17.4? #21312
  • .NET 8.0.10 breaks MAUI builds #21170
    .NET 8 SR3
  • .NET 8.0.203 Doesnt compile non .xaml files to the xml namespace "clr-namespace" #21299
  • [Windows] Button font image source incorrectly sized on 8.0.10 when specifying a button HeightRequest #21202
    .NET 8 SR3
  • ITMS-91053: Missing API declaration on iOS app submission to App Store #21296
  • Add Maui 8.0.10 to list of Versions (etc) #21298
  • [Bug] No error when try push outside NavigationPage #2013
    .NET 8 SR4
  • ViewCell Disappears when unfocused #5292
  • ScrollView does not recompute scroll size when content is being modified programmatically. #18207
  • Add more tests for Images on buttons #20648
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Update to latest RC.5 of Appium #20624
    .NET 8 SR4

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Update BlazorWebView Device Tests to use newer handle test base classes #21318
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [UI Testing] Split mouse and touch Appium actions and added pending ones (TouchAndHold etc) #21305
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fix display of ActionSheet in modal view on Windows #21295
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert

Merged

  • [ios] avoid duplicating `CALayer.Sublayer` arrays #21308
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, partner/cat 😻
  • Fix Namesapces on Frame DeviceTests #21311
  • Find failing Frame tests in CI #21287
  • [testing] Ignore failing tests #21266
    area/testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci
  • [net9.0] Bump Samsung Tizen versions #21275
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Merge sr3 main #21301
  • Update bug-report.yml SR3 #21309
  • Update the Multi-Project styles #21282
  • Throw error when pushing without wrapping into navigation page #20155
    t/breaking 💥, area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix FontImageSource resize behavior #21212
    platform/windows 🪟, control-button, i/regression
  • [main] Merge release/8.0.1xx-sr3 to main #21290
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.6 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Span] Improve formatting inheritance #21191
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [android] avoid `OnLayout()` for `Label` #21291
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [Android] Span line height fix #20352
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [X] Improve warnings when binding cannot be compiled #21281
  • [net9.0] Update all net9 versions preview3 #21276
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 1/2) #21050
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [C] use ResourcesChanged to propagate Theme #21229
    area/Xaml </>
  • Change activity attributes #20653
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 8 SR4
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Replace Deprecated BeginImageContextWithOptions with UIGraphicsImageRenderer #18631
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/controls 🎮, stale
  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
    area/shell 🐢
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DbContext from pool contains many InternalEntityEntry instances after clearing change tracker #33354
  • How to diagnose generic connection error without stack trace #33353
  • Handle exact filtered includes without giving an error #33352

Closed

  • How to coalesce values when navigating nullable relationships? #33336
  • EF Core Query Translation Bug: Missing Elements in SQL for Complex GroupBy with Union and Cross Join #33244

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] [CG] Update Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos #33356
    tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Update EOL OS versions #33355
    tell-mode
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351

Updated

  • Precompiled query inner loop source generator #33350

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Potential off-by-one in versions for runtime packs/app hosts/etc for .NET 7 vs .NET 6? #19067

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19105
  • 1ES templates - small cleanup #19104
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19102
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Migrate SB and UB pipelines to 1ES templates #19100

Merged

  • Remove 2.1-5.0 templates #19094
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.2xx #19002
  • Support building with desktop msbuild #19095

Updated

  • Updates to Binary Tooling #19043
  • Enable roslyn for unified build #18769
  • Move unified build sdk validation to a test project #19090
  • Create and publish VerticalAssetManifest #19062
  • Use the VMR commit hash for dotnet --info #18941
  • Use built-in `SourceRevisionId` instead of `git rev-parse HEAD` #19091
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Migrate VMR pipeline to 1ES templates #19073
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #19053
